backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing access control, supporter requests and approvals, and user profile storage with authorization and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented frontend files to two gallery‑related feature IDs with component versions and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing short summaries for numerous frontend files, describing their roles in routing, UI, content pages, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining light and dark theme CSS variables and applying global background, text, and border styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx as the entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React application configuring TanStack Router routes and wrapping the app with ThemeProvider, AgeGate, and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/AgeGate.tsx: Component enforcing an 18+ confirmation dialog using localStorage before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/AuthControls.tsx: Authentication dropdown handling login, admin-claim attempts, and navigation to the user's profile or edit page.
frontend/src/components/community/Linkif: Converts text into tokens and renders links, video embeds, and plain text safely.
frontend/src/components/community/Modera: Fetches and displays moderation queue items with approve/reject actions and loading/error handling.
frontend/src/components/community/PollCa: Shows an individual poll with voting UI, results, supporter badge, and backend error handling.
frontend/src/components/community/PollsS: Lists existing polls and provides a form for authenticated users to create new polls with option limits.
frontend/src/components/community/PostAc: Offers edit and delete actions for posts using dialogs, with form state and async handlers.
frontend/src/components/community/PostCo: Displays comments for a post, handles loading, backend errors, and authenticated comment submission.
frontend/src/components/community/PostIm: Renders an image attachment by converting byte data to a Blob URL and cleaning it up on unmount.
frontend/src/components/community/PostLi: Shows like count and toggles like/unlike actions with backend‑error handling and auth checks.
frontend/src/components/community/PostVi: Embeds a video attachment using a direct streaming URL from an ExternalBlob.
frontend/src/components/community/VideoE: Renders a responsive 16:9 iframe embed for approved video providers like YouTube or Vimeo.
frontend/src/components/gallery/GalleryL: Full‑screen lightbox for gallery items with keyboard navigation, media display, and favorite toggling.
frontend/src/components/gallery/GalleryU: Dialog for uploading image or video files with validation, progress tracking, and backend submission.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Provides the main site layout with header, navigation, outlet content, and footer.
frontend/src/components/LoadingState.tsx: Displays a centered loading spinner with an optional message.
frontend/src/components/Nav.tsx: Renders desktop and mobile navigation menus with active link highlighting.
frontend/src/components/profiles/AvatarU: Handles avatar image selection, validation, previewing, conversion to ExternalBlob, and removal.
frontend/src/components/profiles/EditPro: Profile editor panel allowing users to update display name, bio, avatar, links, plushie images, and visibility, with save and validation logic.
frontend/src/components/profiles/Plushie: Manages adding, previewing, validating, and removing multiple plushie images and updates parent with new blobs.
frontend/src/components/profiles/Profile: Displays a responsive grid of plushie images using their direct URLs.
Renders a list of external profile links, normalizing URLs and opening them in new tabs.
frontend/src/components/supporter/Suppor: Simple supporter badge component with a heart icon and gradient styling.
frontend/src/content/articles.ts: Defines the Article type and exports a list of article objects with metadata and full content.
frontend/src/content/events.ts: Empty file reserved for event content definitions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useGalleryFavorites.t: Provides localStorage-backed favorite gallery item tracking with toggle and lookup methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useGalleryMediaQuerie: React Query hooks for listing and uploading gallery media items through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, managing login, stored identity loading, and related state.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfileQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching, editing, and saving user profiles and follow data using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for posts, moderation, and admin checks, including creation, editing, deletion, and list fetching.
frontend/src/hooks/useStaticAssetAvailab: Exports a hook that checks whether a static asset URL is reachable with caching and retry logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useSupporterQueries.t: Implements supporter-related queries and mutations, including fetching supporters, submitting requests, and admin approval actions.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind-based global styles and a soft pastel color theme for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page describing the community mission, values, offerings, and guidelines.
frontend/src/pages/AdultPacifierBrandsPa: Renders a grid of adult pacifier brand cards with names, specialties, and descriptions, plus an informational section about the list.
frontend/src/pages/ArticleDetailPage.tsx: Displays a full article based on URL slug with category, read time, summary, and parsed content; shows a not-found message if missing.
frontend/src/pages/ArticlesPage.tsx: Lists all articles as clickable cards showing category, read time, title, and summary.
frontend/src/pages/ColoringPage.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/CommunityBoardPage.ts: Implements a community board with post creation, editing, deletion, media attachments, moderation tools, and backend availability checks.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Provides a contact form that opens a prefilled email and an option to copy the site's contact address.
frontend/src/pages/EventsPage.tsx: Displays community events and includes a form for authenticated users to create new events with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Shows a searchable, filterable gallery with lightbox viewing, favorites, and upload support for authenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page with hero section, intro text, call‑to‑action buttons, and fallback image handling.
frontend/src/pages/PlushieBrandsPage.tsx: Displays a grid of plushie brands with names, descriptions, and specialty badges.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Profile view with loading states, follow/like toggles, editing mode, and user details display.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilesDirectoryPage: Shows a directory of public profiles with avatars, bios, and links to individual profile pages.
frontend/src/pages/SupportPage.tsx: Support page allowing users to submit supporter requests and admins to approve or revoke supporters.
frontend/src/utils/actorError.ts: Normalizes various backend error types into simplified user messages and includes helpers to detect stopped-canister and sanitize raw error text.
frontend/src/utils/galleryMedia.ts: Defines static and uploaded gallery item models, converts backend items, merges lists, and supports search and favorites filtering.
frontend/src/utils/imageAttachment.ts: Validates image files, converts them to byte data, formats file sizes, and exposes accepted types for upload handling.
frontend/src/utils/linkifyText.ts: Parses text into tokens for plain text, links, and video embeds using URL detection and cleanup logic.
frontend/src/utils/profileImages.ts: Converts files to bytes or ExternalBlob, creates and revokes preview URLs, and retrieves direct blob URLs for display.
frontend/src/utils/staticAssetCheck.ts: Checks reachability of static assets using HEAD with GET fallback and handles network or CORS failures.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Gets, stores, and clears URL parameters with session persistence and hash‑based routing support.
frontend/src/utils/videoAttachment.ts: Validates video files against accepted types and size limits and formats file sizes.
frontend/src/utils/videoEmbeds.ts: Detects YouTube or Vimeo URLs and extracts embed information for supported video formats.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom fonts, extended color variables, container settings, shadows, and animations using multiple plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing gallery upload features, their status, requirements, and overall state for mixed image/video gallery development.
